rules_text:
Reach, haste
[i]Pass[/i] – Creatures you control with reach can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
[i]Lucky Seven[/i] – As long as you control seven or more artifacts, creatures you control have “[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, this creature explores, then connives.”
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {U}{B}{R}
